item.description:
PLEASE NOTE THIS IMPORTANT TIME UPDATE AND CLARIFICATION!!!!!!!!!

THE DRUID WILL REMOVE THE TABLES FOR THE BAND AND THEY WILL START AT 3:30!!!  So you would want to get there well before that.  Eat first later, at the number of great restaurants on the same block, same side of the street.

$5  for the COVER CHARGE at the door. Irish Music!

Direction: Bus Routes from Central Square Red Line T stop = #83, #91 from the corner of Mass Ave & Magazine St.

Walking from the Central Square T stop: 15 minute walk down Prospect St to Hampshire St, turn left & go to Cambridge St., turn right (see Map, above)

Parking:  unrestricted in Cambridge on Sundays.

NO Complaining: if you are LATE:  Please do not complain to us that there is no parking and can't find anyone because it's too crowded/standing room only.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a burgundy colored beret
item.name: Early Evening St Patrick's Day Cheer
